casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Markeith R. LAWRENCE. No. 293A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 24, 2005. Amy C. Kunstling, Assistant Attorney General, Howard S. Boney, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th day of October 2005 by Stephen D. Kiess to Withdraw as Counsel:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 24th day of October 2005.
